text:
Amazon Alexa | Data Engineer, BI Engineer, Software Engineer, Technical PM | Santa Barbara, CA | ONSITE

Alexa is Amazonâ€™s groundbreaking virtual assistant designed for voice interactions. We believe voice is the most natural interface for interacting with technology across many domains. We are looking for multiple roles to join our Analytics team located in beautiful Santa Barbara, CA.

Our 4 opening roles are highly visible across the organization. They require familiarity with AWS technologies, strong communication and technical skills, and expertise in big data ETL.

To apply, check out our openings: https://www.amazon.jobs/en/jobs/616470/data-engineer-alexa https://www.amazon.jobs/en/jobs/735018/business-intelligence... https://www.amazon.jobs/en/jobs/679696/technical-program-man... https://www.amazon.jobs/en/jobs/737188/software-development-...

And email me at miknguy at amazon dot com with your outlined interests and expertise.
